text: Micromonospora fulviviridis is an endophytic actinomycete, with type strain DSM 43906T. == References == ==Further reading== * * * ==External links== * *LPSN *Type strain of Micromonospora fulviviridis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Micromonosporineae Category:Bacteria described in 2005
title: Micromonospora fulviviridis
